short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: bans all potentially malicious zip extension domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
banzip blocks all potentially risky domains with the ".zip" extension. banzip was developed as open source.

It was recently announced that domains with .zip extension can be purchased. Harmful people who buy such domains can take domain names like "update.zip" and present misleading content.

You can visit:
https://github.com/sercanarga/banzip
for improvements and bugs.
